description:
•  Graduated from The Harker School class of 2013.
•  While there, I founded TEDxHarkerSchool.
•  I was one of the youngest TEDx founders ever.
name: The Harker School

description:
•  I will be on Venmo's SF iOS Team during Summer 2014.
•  I'll either work on the iOS app or the Venmo Touch SDK.
name: Venmo

description:
•  Save gift cards on your iPhone.
•  Cards are accepted universally due to a standardized barcode display.
•  This was my first experience building the server-side architecture in addition to the front end for an iOS app.
name: giftbook

description:
•  This was the first app I ever built.
•  I made it while teaching myself iOS with Stanford's lectures.
•  Zero touches are required by the user to shorten a URL.
name: URL Shortener for goo.gl

description: •  I completed unit testing of Poshmark's iPhone and iPad apps.
name: Poshmark

description:
•  Travel the world through the eyes of Instagram, right from your iPhone.
•  I built Take Me Away while on a bus ride to LA for HackTech.
name: Take Me Away

description:
•  Crowdsourced cloud-based contact sharing iOS app.
•  Awarded Top 10 at MHacks, the largest hackathon ever at the time.
name: Rolodex

description:
•  At PennApps, we built an Objective-C interpreter in Objective-C.
•  With the interpreter, we were able to run native Objective-C code and emulate the iOS app lifecycle on an iPad.
name: iXcode

description: •  I am a freshman at UC Berkeley, majoring in EECS.
name: UC Berkeley

description:
•  I traveled to Japan in 7th grade.
•  I love everything about the Japanese culture, from the sense of simplicity to the savvy technology.
name: Kyoto, Japan

description:
•  Sophomore year of high school I took part in an exchange trip to Switzerland.
•  Seeing the stark differences between Swiss and American culture opened my eyes to new ways of life.
name: Fribourg, Switzerland

description:
•  Built a voice-activated camera at TechCrunch Disrupt SF 2013.
•  Recognized by RadiumOne for API usage.
name: SpeakToSnap

description:
•  iOS app to facilitate communication between teachers and parents.
•  Helps elementary school parents stay in touch with the classroom.
•  Will be piloted at elementary schools in San Rafael.
name: iClassroom

description:
•  Food-centric social network.
•  Enables restaurant discovery through images and proximity rather than simply text.
•  Came up with the idea while sharing a stunning cup of Sightglass Coffee.
name: Dish

description:
•  While at HackTech, we took advantage of the New Year's Snapchat username leak and their weak CAPTCHA to exploit their service.
•  CEO Evan Spiegel came to the hackathon to hear about our hack.
name: SnapHack

description:
•  Built an app at HackMIT that provided recommendations on interesting things to do around you.
•  Based recommendations off what your friends had done nearby.
name: Here

description:
•  Two of my friends and I founded a global business and entrepreneurship program at Harker.
•  The now biannual trip was designed to give high school students greater exposure to India and its startup culture.
name: New Delhi, India
